languages.text: "Расследование уже запущено, Лорд-капитан. Произошедшее не повлияло на безопасность наших вокс-передач — это больше похоже на встречное авгур-сканирование".
"The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."
languages.original_text: "Расследование уже запущено, Лорд-капитан. Произошедшее не повлияло на безопасность наших вокс-передач — это больше похоже на встречное авгур-сканирование".

traits.locale_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."
"The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."
"The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

"The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."
"The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

languages.text: "Die Untersuchung läuft bereits, Lord Captain. Der Zwischenfall hat die Sicherheit unserer Vox-Nachrichten nicht beeinträchtigt ... es schien sich eher um einen reziproken Augurenscan zu handeln."
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: "Die Untersuchung läuft bereits, Lord Captain. Der Zwischenfall hat die Sicherheit unserer Vox-Nachrichten nicht beeinträchtigt ... es schien sich eher um einen reziproken Augurenscan zu handeln."

languages.text: « L'enquête est déjà en cours, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'incident n'a pas compromis la sécurité de nos transmissions-vox, cela ressemble davantage à un scan d'augures réciproque. »
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: « L'enquête est déjà en cours, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. L'incident n'a pas compromis la sécurité de nos transmissions-vox, cela ressemble davantage à un scan d'augures réciproque. »

languages.text: “调查已经在进行了，舰长大人。这个问题对音阵频道的安全性没有任何影响，感觉更像是某种交互扫描。”
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: “调查已经在进行了，舰长大人。这个问题对音阵频道的安全性没有任何影响，感觉更像是某种交互扫描。”

languages.text: «La investigación ya está en curso, Lord Capitán. El incidente no ha afectado a la seguridad de los mensajes de voco... Se parecía más a un escaneo mutuo entre augures».
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: «La investigación ya está en curso, Lord Capitán. El incidente no ha afectado a la seguridad de los mensajes de voco... Se parecía más a un escaneo mutuo entre augures».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、調査はすでに進行中です。今回の出来事は、私たちのヴォックスメッセージの安全性には影響を与えておらず、オーガーの相互スキャンに似ているようでした」
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、調査はすでに進行中です。今回の出来事は、私たちのヴォックスメッセージの安全性には影響を与えておらず、オーガーの相互スキャンに似ているようでした」

languages.text: "Soruşturma devam ediyor Lord Kaptan. Olay, voks yayınlarımızın güvenliğini etkilemedi. Daha çok karşılıklı alamet taramasına benziyor."
languages.original_text: "The investigation is already underway, Lord Captain. The incident did not affect the security of our vox-casts — it seemed more akin to reciprocal augur scanning."

traits.locale_text: "Soruşturma devam ediyor Lord Kaptan. Olay, voks yayınlarımızın güvenliğini etkilemedi. Daha çok karşılıklı alamet taramasına benziyor."
